name: Beam Reflector
description:
==== Description ====

Beam Reflector is a puzzle top down game where you need to rotate the mirrors in order to redirect the beam to turn on the lights and move on to the next level.

I created this game for the gamedev.js jam 2021

The game implement web monetization for the Game Jam, the users with web monetization can change the skins of the player.

==== Controls ====

- Arrow keys to move. - C to (rotate the mirror, shoot the gun).
